item.title: 红杉将从 Wiz 出售给 Alphabet 的交易中获得 25 倍的回报
item.description: 据一位知情人士透露，Wiz 的支持者红杉资本准备从这家即将出售给谷歌母公司 Alphabet Inc.【原文：Wiz backer Sequoia Capital is poised to deliver a return of about 25 times its invested capital from the cybersecurity startup’s pending sale to Google parent Alphabet Inc., according to a person with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 渴求回报的基金老板们正纷纷投入国防投资
item.description: 多年来，ESG 基金的回报率一直不尽如人意，受此打击的基金老板们正在迅速重新定义他们的任务，以便为利润丰厚的防御赌注腾出空间。【原文：ESG fund bosses battered by years of underperforming returns are rapidly redefining their mandates to make room for highly lucrative defense bets.】

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克一直在以接近最初购买价的价格买入 X 股票
item.description: 埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）去年投资 1.5 亿美元收购了 X 公司的更多股份，估值接近他在 2022 年购买该公司股权时的价格。【原文：Elon Musk invested $150 million to acquire more shares in X last year at a valuation approaching the price he paid for the company’s equity in 2022.】

item.title: 欠下市政债的塑料燃料回收厂破产了
item.description: 印第安纳州的一家回收厂六年前曾向市政债券投资者寻求资金，但因设计缺陷和生产停滞而申请破产。【原文：An Indiana recycling plant that tapped municipal bond investors for capital six years ago has filed for bankruptcy after the facility was marred by design flaws and production sputtered.】

item.title: Cathie Wood 称大多数 Memecoins 最终将 "一文不值
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）认为，大多数充斥在 2.6 万亿美元加密货币领域的所谓memecoins 最终可能会 "一文不值"。【原文：Most of the so-called memecoins that are flooding the $2.6 trillion cryptocurrency space will probably end up “worthless,” according to Cathie Wood.】

item.title: Wiz 创始人拒绝了谷歌的邀请，然后对额外的 90 亿美元表示 "愿意"。
item.description: 去年夏天，投资者说服网络初创公司 Wiz 的创始人拒绝了谷歌 230 亿美元的收购要约。他们担心美国政府会阻止这笔交易，并认为 Wiz 作为一家独立公司会更好。【原文：Last summer, investors persuaded the founders of cyber startup Wiz to turn down Google’s $23 billion takeover offer. They feared the US government would block the deal and argued that Wiz was better off as an independent company.】

item.title: 胡塞武装红海船只袭击如何颠覆全球贸易
item.description: 胡塞武装对红海船只的袭击造成了自 "科维德-19 "大流行以来最大的全球贸易混乱，抑制了世界上最繁忙的海上通道之一的活动。【原文：The Houthi assaults on ships in the Red Sea caused the biggest disruption to global trade since the Covid-19 pandemic, subduing activity in one of the world’s busiest maritime corridors.】

item.title: Nvidia 将参与通用汽车辅助驾驶项目并开发 6G 网络
item.description: 已成为人工智能热潮代名词的芯片制造商英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., the chipmaker that’s become synonymous with the artificial intelligence boom, said it will help General Motors Co. with driver-assistance technology and work with the telecom industry on new 6G networks.】

item.title: OpenAI 的首个星际之门站点可容纳多达 400,000 块 Nvidia 芯片
item.description: OpenAI 斥资 1000 亿美元建立的星际之门基础设施企业的首个数据中心综合体将可容纳多达 40 万颗英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：The first data center complex for OpenAI’s $100 billion Stargate infrastructure venture will have space for as many as 400,000 of Nvidia Corp.’s powerful AI chips — an amount that, if filled, would make it one of the largest known clusters of artificial intelligence computing power.】

item.title: 输油管泄漏事故后，厄瓜多尔石油公司对壳牌的石油销售陷入困境
item.description: 厄瓜多尔国营石油公司 Petroecuador 表示，该公司可能无法履行出口原油的合同承诺，因为它正在努力控制一条破裂管道造成的泄漏。【原文：Ecuadorian state oil company Petroecuador said it might not be able to honor contractual commitments to export crude as it struggles to control a spill from a ruptured pipeline.】

item.title: 股价上涨 91% 后，Strabag 创始人出售 1.51 亿欧元股份
item.description: Strabag SE 的创始家族 Haselsteiner 提出出售这家奥地利建筑公司约 1.7% 的股份，因为今年该公司的股价上涨了 91%。【原文：Strabag SE’s founding Haselsteiner family offered to sell about 1.7% of the Austrian construction company following a 91% rally this year.】

item.title: 谷歌斥资 320 亿美元收购云计算新贵是一次信念的飞跃
item.description:
很难看出有什么理由让 Wiz 从其追求者那里获得大幅提价。【原文：

It's hard to see what justifies the massive price bump Wiz won from its suitor.

】

item.title: 萨利纳斯阿兹特克电视台的贷款人寻求将案件移交给新法官
item.description: 在一起针对墨西哥亿万富翁里卡多-萨利纳斯-普利戈（Ricardo Salinas Pliego）旗下广播公司阿兹特克电视台（TV Azteca）的长期诉讼案中，代表美国贷款人的律师们正在寻求将诉讼程序移交给一名新法官，因为他们正努力恢复追讨 5 亿美元债务的工作。【原文：Lawyers on behalf of US lenders in a long-running case against Mexican billionaire Ricardo Salinas Pliego’s broadcaster TV Azteca are looking to transfer proceedings to a new judge as they try to revive efforts to recover half a billion dollars in debt.】

item.title: 瑞士监管机构发出信号，瑞银资本要求可能分阶段实施
item.description: 瑞士金融监管机构表示，愿意在数年内分阶段提高瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）的资本要求，这可能会推迟该银行激烈反对的改革所带来的影响。【原文：Switzerland’s financial regulator signaled that it would be open to introducing higher capital requirements for UBS Group AG in stages over a number of years, potentially pushing back the impact of changes the bank has fought stiffly against.】

item.title: KKR 探讨收购新墨西哥州公用事业所有者 TXNM
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，KKR & Co. 公司正在探索收购新墨西哥州最大公用事业公司 TXNM Energy Inc.【原文：KKR & Co. is exploring an acquisition of TXNM Energy Inc., the owner of New Mexico’s largest utility, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 爱尔兰总统哈里斯表示欧盟愿意与特朗普就关税问题进行谈判
item.description: 爱尔兰副总理表示，欧盟准备在就报复性关税做出更多决定之前与美国总统唐纳德-特朗普进行会谈。【原文：The European Union is ready to talk to US President Donald Trump before making any more decisions on retaliatory tariffs, Ireland’s deputy prime minister said.】

item.title: 加拿大卡尼为北极雷达系统挑选澳大利亚合作伙伴
item.description: 加拿大总理马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，加拿大将通过增加全年行动和澳大利亚开发的新雷达系统来探测来袭导弹，从而加强其在北极地区的军事存在。【原文：Prime Minister Mark Carney said Canada will beef up its military presence in the Arctic through increased year-round operations and a new Australian-developed radar system to detect incoming missiles.】

item.title: 安赛乐米塔尔与南非接近达成为陷入困境的钢厂提供资金的协议
item.description: 据知情人士透露，南非即将达成一项协议，为安赛乐米塔尔公司（ArcelorMittal SA）的本地部门提供资金，并使对国家经济至关重要的钢铁厂继续运营。【原文：South Africa is nearing a deal to provide funding to ArcelorMittal SA’s local unit and keep the steel mills open, which are crucial for the nation’s economy, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 你在火星殖民地的工作是什么？
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. item.title: Meta 成为 2025 年最后一只转为负值的 "华丽 7 号 "股票
item.description: Meta Platforms Inc. 周二跌入负值区域，成为所谓的 "华丽七股 "中今年最后一只走低的股票。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. tumbled into negative territory Tuesday, becoming the last of the so-called Magnificent Seven stocks to turn lower this year.】

item.title: 特斯拉股价遭中国竞争对手 "改变游戏规则 "的技术打压
item.description: 特斯拉公司（Tesla Inc. ）在短短几个月内从华尔街最热门的行业变成了最受憎恨的行业。本周，特斯拉股价雪上加霜，中国的一家竞争对手在本应是埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的强项方面超越了该公司：电动汽车创新。【原文：Tesla Inc. has gone from Wall Street’s hottest trade to most hated in a matter of months. Compounding the stock’s woes this week, a rival out of China has one-upped the company on what’s supposed to be Elon Musk’s forte: EV innovation.】

item.title: 银行计划下周出售 86.5 亿欧元赛诺菲收购债务
item.description: 各家银行正准备卸载支持 Clayton Dubilier & Rice 公司收购赛诺菲公司消费者健康部门股份的 86.5 亿欧元（95 亿美元）一揽子债务。【原文：Banks are gearing up to offload the €8.65 billion ($9.5 billion) debt package backing Clayton Dubilier & Rice’s purchase of a stake in Sanofi SA’s consumer health division.】

item.title: 前俄罗斯州长因违反制裁规定面临英国审判
item.description: 克里米亚一个具有重要战略意义的港口城市的前俄罗斯省长因无视金融限制而受到制裁，目前正在伦敦接受审判。【原文：A sanctioned former Russian governor of a strategically important port city in Crimea is standing trial in London for flouting the financial restrictions.】

item.title: 肯尼亚企业谴责导致骚乱的不可预测税法
item.description: 肯尼亚商界领袖表示，该国的税收制度难以预测且前后不一，这给在这个东非国家运营的公司增加了一层风险，去年有数十名抗议者在反税游行中丧生。【原文：Kenyan business leaders say the nation’s taxation regime is unpredictable and inconsistent, adding a layer of risk for firms operating in the East African nation that saw dozens of protesters killed in anti-tax marches last year.】

item.title: 法国经济因贸易疑虑和政治不稳定而放缓
item.description: 法国统计局称，由于担心全球贸易战和政治危机对公共开支的影响，法国经济陷入增长乏力的困境。【原文：France’s economy is mired in sluggish growth, weighed down by concerns of a global trade war and the impact of a political crisis on public spending, the country’s statistics agency said.】

item.title: 智能手表先驱 Pebble 重新发布苹果手表替代品
item.description: 埃里克-米基科夫斯基（Eric Migicovsky）的智能手表初创公司Pebble Technology Corp.于2016年被Fitbit收购，他正带着一家新公司Core Devices LLC和两款仿照Pebble原始硬件设计的产品重返这一领域。【原文：Eric Migicovsky, whose smartwatch startup Pebble Technology Corp. was bought by Fitbit in 2016, is returning to the space with a new company, Core Devices LLC, and two products modeled after Pebble’s original hardware.】

item.title: 甲骨文权衡安全支持和少量股份以达成 TikTok 交易
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，甲骨文公司正在权衡出售 TiKTok 美国业务的提议，该提议将要求甲骨文公司提供安全保证，并在一家新的美国实体中持有少量股份，同时可能将该应用的重要算法留在中国人手中。【原文：Oracle Corp. is weighing a proposal for a sale of TiKTok’s US operations that would have it provide security assurances and take a small stake in a new American entity while potentially leaving the app’s influential algorithm in Chinese hands, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 彼得罗石油公司因提前公布哥伦比亚经济数据遭抨击
item.description: 哥伦比亚总统古斯塔沃-彼得罗（Gustavo Petro）周二提前公布了哥伦比亚的经济活动数据，因此面临反弹。【原文：President Gustavo Petro is facing backlash for releasing Colombia’s economic activity data ahead of its official publication time on Tuesday.】

item.title: 加纳寻求控制可可局 20 亿美元的债务负担
item.description: 加纳陷入困境的可可局已开始对其 320 亿塞地（20 亿美元）的债务进行审查，新任首席执行官誓言要在可可产量下降的情况下加强其资产负债表，以更好地支持生产商。【原文：Ghana’s embattled cocoa board has started a review of its 32 billion cedis ($2 billion) debt pile, with the new chief executive vowing to shore up its balance sheet to better support producers amid falling cocoa output.】

item.title: 高盛、麦肯锡认为追求欧洲冠军是 M&A 的驱动力
item.description: 据该地区的一些顶级顾问称，随着与美国的地缘政治紧张局势和贸易关税推动欧洲大陆的公司进行整合，欧洲可能会成为全球并购领域难得的亮点。【原文：Europe could emerge as a rare bright spot in global M&A, as geopolitical tensions with the US and trade tariffs propel companies in the continent to consolidate, according to some of the region’s top advisers.】
